page.title: 17Arts & Crafts, Ardington(2)
page.content: Mr and Mrs Handley have called their firm at Home Farm "Country Chairmen". They reseat chairs in rush and cane and restore and repair furniture.They have recently reseated 1000 chairs for Salisbury Cathedral. The cane is imported from Malaysia but all the rushes they use are harvested locally by themselves and a small band of helpers in July each year.They are able to provide rushes for about 30 other craftsmen around the country. Mr Nicholas Dyson studied English at Cambridge and worked for 12 years as an editor for an academic publisher before deciding to set up as a furniture designer and manufacturer.He has a small but well equipped workshop, and he designs and makes individual pieces of furniture in hardwoods to a very high standard.
